name: Runa's Date
description:
Runa's Date is a mix between a dating simulator, puzzle game, and visual novel.

Play as a bad or good guy, and influence the main heroine, Runa, through your interactions with her!Game features:
  • Fascinating dates made in match-3 style puzzles
  • Get to know Runa through two 2 different routes
  • Live2D Runa with more than 60 animated emotions
  • More than 20 backgrounds, many that are variations of different times of the day
  • Soundtrack containing 10 songs inspired by tropical house
  • Completely dialogue-based story
  • Runa's emotions voiced in Japanese (CV Yuuri Satsuki)
  • 7 unforgettable outfits for Runa.
